subject: Research Program Inquiry â€“ Master's (Student Id: 174647461)
body:
Dear Dr. [First Name],

I hope you're well. My name is Raj Kiran Thovarayi, and I hold a degree in Tought Computer Science with 8 years of professional experience. I currently work in a research-focused role at a software development company in London, where I explore and apply emerging technologies.

I am interested in pursuing a research-oriented Master of Science in Computer Science, with a focus on Artificial Intelligence, and I would be grateful for the opportunity to study under your supervision. I am able to self-fund and am open to conducting research on my areas of interest or any topic related to AI that you may have available.

If you are accepting new students, please find attached my CV, academic transcipt, and a brief research-proposal outline of my interests.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best regards,
Raj Kiran Thovarayi
https://www.linkedin.com/in/rajkirant/
